text: A Reasonable Man is a 1999 South African French crime drama movie directed by first time director Gavin Hood (who also stars) and also starring Nigel Hawthorne, Vusi Kunene, Ken Gampu, Ian Roberts, Keketso Semoko, Duma Mnembe. ==Other websites== * * Category:1999 crime drama movies Category:South African crime movies Category:South African drama movies Category:French crime movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies set in South Africa Category:Movies directed by Gavin Hood
title: A Reasonable Man
